name: SCNMatrix4
desc: A representation of a 4 x 4 matrix.

items.name: func SCNMatrix4MakeTranslation(Float, Float, Float) -> SCNMatrix4
items.desc: Returns a matrix describing a translation transformation.

items.name: func SCNMatrix4MakeRotation(Float, Float, Float, Float) -> SCNMatrix4
items.desc: Returns a matrix describing a rotation transformation.

items.name: func SCNMatrix4MakeScale(Float, Float, Float) -> SCNMatrix4
items.desc: Returns a matrix describing a scale transformation.

items.name: init(m11: Float, m12: Float, m13: Float, m14: Float, m21: Float, m22: Float, m23: Float, m24: Float, m31: Float, m32: Float, m33: Float, m34: Float, m41: Float, m42: Float, m43: Float, m44: Float)
func SCNMatrix4Translate(SCNMatrix4, Float, Float, Float) -> SCNMatrix4
items.desc: Returns a new matrix created by concatenating the specified matrix with a translation transformation.

items.name: func SCNMatrix4Rotate(SCNMatrix4, Float, Float, Float, Float) -> SCNMatrix4
items.desc: Returns a new matrix created by concatenating the specified matrix with a rotation transformation.

items.name: func SCNMatrix4Scale(SCNMatrix4, Float, Float, Float) -> SCNMatrix4
items.desc: Returns a new matrix created by concatenating the specified matrix with a scale transformation.

items.name: func SCNMatrix4Invert(SCNMatrix4) -> SCNMatrix4
items.desc: Returns the inverse of the specified matrix.

items.name: func SCNMatrix4Mult(SCNMatrix4, SCNMatrix4) -> SCNMatrix4
items.desc: Returns the product of two matrices.

items.name: func SCNMatrix4FromGLKMatrix4(GLKMatrix4) -> SCNMatrix4
items.desc: Returns a SceneKit matrix corresponding to a GLKit matrix.

items.name: func SCNMatrix4ToGLKMatrix4(SCNMatrix4) -> GLKMatrix4
items.desc: Returns a GLKit matrix corresponding to a SceneKit matrix.

items.name: func SCNMatrix4EqualToMatrix4(SCNMatrix4, SCNMatrix4) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the corresponding elements of two matrices are equal.

items.name: func SCNMatrix4IsIdentity(SCNMatrix4) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the specified matrix is equal to the identity matrix.
